refnamediv.refpurpose: Invokes the just-in-time compiler to produce a instantiable DSP process from a Faust program.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in faustcsound. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
Faustcompile will compile a Faust program from a string, controlled by various arguments. Multi-line strings are accepted, using {{ }} to enclose the string.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: Scode -- a string (in double-quotes or enclosed by {{ }}) containing a Faust program.
Sargs -- a string (in double-quotes or enclosed by {{ }}) containing Faust compiler args.
iasync -- run the code asynchronously, non-blocking, (iasync=1), or blocking mode (iasync=0). Defaults to 1.
istacksize -- size of the compiler thread stack in MB (defaults to 1).
